thread.section_title: Transcat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Transcat | www.transcat.com | 3 of 49
thread.title: Frugal Engineer

author: Frugal Engineer
title: Frugal Engineer
text: I was pleased with item browsing and value. I was unpleasantly surprised by the omission of the abilities to complete a transaction without creating an account and without retaining payment method info (beyond the transaction), and by the subsequent lack of either automatic (email) or manual (Web page) order status update of fulfillment delay (after 9 days I had to contact Sales myself to learn of a backorder). These were Web store characteristics that were widely eradicated over the past two decades.
